text_block_list.text: My interim contract with Ines Fujin had started. I wanted to make the most of this chance. Of course —
There's a risk of injury if I work her too hard. I don't want to force this on her, but work with her, provide her choices… With that in mind, I carefully crafted my training regimens.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Whoa, how many did you make?!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: This regimen's about speed, this one focuses on stamina…

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Wait, these are all just for start dashes?! Ahaha, you're too gung-ho about this～!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Aah, my sides. …But hey, I like that you're enthusiastic but you don't expect to finish all of this before the Meet, do you?
I'd like to observe her through different trainings and determine what she needs from that.
So for the training itself, I wanted her to choose a few options herself, keeping the load in mind. And that's what I told her……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Huh, you want me to choose?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… I see, okay! I wonder which one I should go with then～ Let me find something you'd have a hard time with～♪
That pretty much set the tone for my training with Ines Fujin.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haaa, my whole body is feeling it. But bring it on! I haven't had enough yet!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haah, haaa…… Aaaaah. I need…… a moment!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Gheeeh…… Haaah…… Pheeeew……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Aaaah…… Can't stand up anymore…… …… Haha, feels good though —
Having her choose from my regimens, supporting and analyzing her as she goes through them. We continued that pattern for a number of days.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Really?! You figured out what escape strat fits me?! Tell me, tell me～!
I'd come to a conclusion after watching her for a few days now. The girl just likes to run. With no care to races, or training, or sanity.
She will run until she flat-out collapses. She can. And that's not something anyone can. So —
choice_data_list: You can try a battle of attrition.

text_block_list.text: You start out at high pace, pulling a lead. Midway you gather your breath, and go all out spending your stored energy on the final straight.
If you can calmly control your pace, then when everyone starts to catch up near the end, your ability to give it your absolute everything will surely become a great asset.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I see…… if I have energy left, guts will take care of the rest!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Keep on running, never giving up my lead, no matter what… Yeah, I know I can do that. So… I can win!
More time passed, and on our important last day for final adjustments —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Eeeeh! 100% chance of rain all day!? Our training…!
There are plenty of indoor training facilities at Tracen Academy. If they are free, we should be able to work on a few things there.
With that glimmer of hope, we made our way to the indoor gym and pool, but —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Aw shucks. I didn't think the gym and pool would be all booked up.
choice_data_list: Sorry, I should've checked the weather…
Sorry, I should've checked the weather…

text_block_list.text: To think we'd be spending this important final day stuck in the trainer's office……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… Trainer. Let Miss Ines teach you a magic phrase.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: "First, calm down, second, be positive. Now take it one thing at a time!"

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: How's that? Mom often told me this phrase when I was a little girl, and I still recall it when I want to move forward.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Have a try too, recite the words in your mind. I promise it'll calm you down!
Contrary to her playful words, her eyes were staring straight into mine. It finally sank in that she must have been quite worried about me.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: That's right! My mom ― everyone in my family is amazing! She's kind and knows so many important things.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: And it's thanks to them that I'm at Tracen now.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: That's right. …But it was a little more complicated for us.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Mom's very frail. My younger sisters were still small and a handful. I wanted to help out too, so I went to a regular junior high school.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Oh, I did love running. I ran in a club team since elementary. But I was going to quit that after junior high too.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: So, you know… I knew I could still get into Tracen from senior high too, but I wasn't planning to ――

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: (Tomorrow's my last race with the club, huh? If I want to go to a trade school…… I won't be able to race anymore.)

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Aaahh! Think of something else! I'll get used to not running anymore after a few months!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: That's when mom handed me a thick bundle of papers. I looked through it and… it was an application for admission to Tracen Academy Senior High.

text_block_list.name: Ines' Mom
text_block_list.text: We'll be fine. Your sisters have grown up too. You go and dive into what you want to do.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Mom……

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Those words pushed me to face my feelings. I was able to ask myself, "Don't you really still want to run?" —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: A future where I could go to Tracen started to appear. … Although it took me a little longer to make up my mind!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Yeah! That's how mom got me started…… And when I decided to enroll, dad scraped together the money to pay for the school…

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: My little sisters support mom now. My family is the reason I can be here!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ― My family's coming to watch, so you know. I thought it'd be a good chance to show them "hey, I'm doing my best and growing at this academy".
She spoke pretty casually… But I could tell how important her family was to her.
We have to produce a good result at the Meet tomorrow. I felt like the sense of mission lifted my expression.
choice_data_list: Let's make your family proud tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ……! Hehe… mm-mm, you look a lot better! That's what I expect of my trainer♪ Ah, temporary trainer, was it!
